text: "Be Easy" is a song by Canadian-Lebanese singer Massari. The song peaked at number four on the Canadian Singles Chart, number 70 on the German Singles Chart and number 24 on the Portuguese Singles Chart. The song became the second single from Massari (2005). The music video won "Best Pop Video of the Year" at the 2006 MuchMusic Video Awards. ==Charts== Chart (2006)Acharts.us - Massari's Be Easy Peak position Canadian Singles Chart 4 German Singles Chart 70 Portuguese Singles Chart 24 ==References== Category:Massari Category:2005 songs
